name: test_e2e_with_logs[081_SQLI_ERROR_015]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_015` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL version disclosure via UNION |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION SELECT NULL,version(),NULL --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20NULL%2Cversion%28%29%2CNULL%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~57000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:32.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_015-1772268932210-el60tg pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_015 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20NULL%2Cversion%28%29%2CNULL%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_015-1772268932210-el60tg pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_015 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20NULL%2Cversion%28%29%2CNULL%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
08:55:32.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_015-1772268932210-el60tg pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_015 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20NULL%2Cversion%28%29%2CNULL%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
